mapper.select: SELECT ort.rn, ort.user_no, ort.apply_no, ort.stage_name, ort.bus_date, ort.start_time, ort.end_time, ort.nickname, ort.genre, ort.hp, ort.user_info, ort.status from (SELECT rownum rn, ot.user_no, ot.apply_no, ot.stage_name, ot.bus_date, ot.start_time, ot.end_time, ot.nickname, ot.genre, ot.hp, ot.user_info, ot.status from (SELECT ba.user_no, ba.apply_no, s.stage_name, bd.bus_date, bt.start_time, bt.end_time, u.nickname, u.genre, u.hp, ba.user_info, ba.status FROM company c, stage s, buskingdate bd, buskingtime bt, buskingapp ba, users u WHERE c.user_no = s.user_no AND s.stage_no = bd.stage_no AND bd.date_no = bt.date_no AND bt.time_no = ba.time_no AND ba.user_no = u.user_no AND c.user_no = #{user_no} order by s.stage_no asc, ba.time_no asc)ot)ort where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

SELECT count(*) FROM company c, stage s, buskingdate bd, buskingtime bt, buskingapp ba, users u WHERE c.user_no = s.user_no AND s.stage_no = bd.stage_no AND bd.date_no = bt.date_no AND bt.time_no = ba.time_no AND ba.user_no = u.user_no AND c.user_no = #{user_no}

SELECT ba.user_no, ba.apply_no, u.nickname, s.stage_name, bd.bus_date, bt.start_time, bt.end_time, u.genre, u.hp, ba.user_info, ba.status FROM company c, stage s, buskingdate bd, buskingtime bt, buskingapp ba, users u WHERE c.user_no = s.user_no AND s.stage_no = bd.stage_no AND bd.date_no = bt.date_no AND bt.time_no = ba.time_no AND ba.user_no = u.user_no and c.user_no= #{user_no} and bus_date between to_date(#{start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd')and to_date(#{end_date},'yyyy-mm-dd') order by s.stage_no asc, ba.time_no asc

SELECT ba.user_no, ba.apply_no, u.nickname, s.stage_name, bd.bus_date, bt.start_time, bt.end_time, u.genre, u.hp, ba.user_info, ba.status FROM company c, stage s, buskingdate bd, buskingtime bt, buskingapp ba, users u WHERE c.user_no = s.user_no AND s.stage_no = bd.stage_no AND bd.date_no = bt.date_no AND bt.time_no = ba.time_no AND ba.user_no = u.user_no and s.stage_no= #{stage_no} and bus_date between to_date(#{start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd')and to_date(#{end_date},'yyyy-mm-dd') order by ba.time_no asc

SELECT ba.apply_no, c.com_name, s.stage_name, bd.bus_date, bt.start_time, bt.end_time, c.address, c.com_number, bd.requirements, ba.status
FROM company c, stage s, buskingdate bd, buskingtime bt, buskingapp ba, users u WHERE c.user_no = s.user_no AND s.stage_no = bd.stage_no AND bd.date_no = bt.date_no AND bt.time_no = ba.time_no AND ba.user_no = u.user_no AND ba.user_no = #{user_no}
